divs: Sighting DetailsMy girl friend and I, were camping outside the town of Snowflake not sure if itwas coconino off of a logging road we found, off the main highway to Snowflake.We had just finished eating Camping out and was just getting dark and wassitting under a pine tree, when I noticed the ground around me eluminating. Ilooked up...and noticed a light that, I thought may have been a big star atfirst...almost straight above me, it started moving down towards me and my girlfriend who I thought was sleeping on my lap. As it got what appeared tobe....4-6ft. away, I realized what I was wittnesing was something from out ofthis world we live in. I became frozen like, with tingeling on the back of myneck and back, my breathing became aratic, I tried to touch it with the end ofmy rifle butt. the object must of been higher, hard to predict. At the closestpoint...it looked to be, what I would describe as a Ball Of Energy which seemedto be anolizing us it definately was zerod in on us for some reason at whatseemed 4-5 ft. away. After a period of maybe a minute or two it started back upSlowly then kind of...dissapated from what Iremember. It definately did not take off....or make like an object that had aflight path or something. I didnt realy start getting scared until...mygirlfriend started grabbing me and wispering what the hell is that Then I knew Iwasnt exaggerating Please help me understand. Steven Paulson
trends: There has been one other sighting in Snowflake
There were no other sightings in Snowflake on or around November 30th 1973
